data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Costing CDS'
define view entity ZETR_DDL_I_COSTING
  as select from    zetr_t_exp130             as CostingMain

    left outer join I_JournalEntry            as _JournalEntry on  _JournalEntry.CompanyCode        = CostingMain.company_code
                                                               and _JournalEntry.FiscalYear         = CostingMain.fiscal_year
                                                               and _JournalEntry.AccountingDocument = CostingMain.journal_entry

    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_COST_TOTAL     as CostTotal     on  CostTotal.CompanyCode  = CostingMain.company_code
                                                               and CostTotal.FiscalYear   = CostingMain.fiscal_year
                                                               and CostTotal.JournalEntry = CostingMain.journal_entry


    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_COST_TAX_TOTAL as TaxTotal      on  TaxTotal.CompanyCode  = CostingMain.company_code
                                                               and TaxTotal.FiscalYear   = CostingMain.fiscal_year
                                                               and TaxTotal.JournalEntry = CostingMain.journal_entry


    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_Supplier_total as SupplierTotal on  SupplierTotal.CompanyCode  = CostingMain.company_code
                                                               and SupplierTotal.FiscalYear   = CostingMain.fiscal_year
                                                               and SupplierTotal.JournalEntry = CostingMain.journal_entry


    left outer join I_Supplier                as _Supplier     on _Supplier.Supplier = SupplierTotal.Supplier

  association to parent ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD as _ExportFile on $projection.filen = _ExportFile.Filen

{

  key CostingMain.filen             as filen,
  key CostingMain.company_code      as CompanyCode,
  key CostingMain.journal_entry     as JournalEntry,
  key CostingMain.fiscal_year       as FiscalYear,
      CostingMain.erdat             as Erdat,
      CostingMain.erzet             as Erzet,
      CostingMain.ernam             as Ernam,
      CostTotal.TransactionCurrency as TransactionCurrency,
      CostTotal.CostTotal           as CostTotal,
      TaxTotal.CostTotal            as TaxTotal,
      SupplierTotal.Supplier        as Supplier,
      _Supplier.SupplierFullName    as SupplierFullName,

      _ExportFile
}

],
